body.p: The Board also emphasised that, when providing prior‑period information in addition to the minimum comparative information required by IFRS Standards, information has to be provided in accordance with those Standards and should not obscure material information. Some stakeholders asked whether providing prior‑period information at the same level of detail as current‑period information could be seen as obscuring material information in the current‑period financial statements. The Board does not expect that such prior‑period information would obscure current‑period material information.
